entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Williams Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:12 PM PST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 2.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Williams Lake Airport 01:00 AM PST Monday 26 December 2022
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 2.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.9 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 87 %
Dewpoint: 0.6°C
Wind: ESE 31 km/h gust 46 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow or rain. Temperature rising to plus 3 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of snow changing to 30 percent chance of rain showers or wet flurries after midnight. Risk of freezing rain this evening. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature rising to plus 3 by morning. Wind chill minus 10 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Chance of rain showers or wet flurries. High 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of rain showers or wet flurries early in the morning. Clearing late in the afternoon. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming south 20 gusting to 40 late in the afternoon. High 7. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then snow beginning before morning. Risk of freezing rain before morning. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late in the evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 25 December 2022
